Cognac was the product of a one-week class project to create and deploy a working Node.js server. I took the project several steps further, writing a full-fledged application boilerplate in CoffeeScript using the Express framework and adding a working Rails-style asset pipeline using the connect-assets module.

The code is open source and is available here.
